snippet.title: ZONERS - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
ZONERS is an entirely fictional, and very over the top 1vs1 sports game, kind of like a cross between Air Hockey, Football, Fighting Games and Saturday morning Cartoons.

At launch, ZONERS is planned to feature:

- 8 distinct, easy to use but difficult to master characters with their own abilities and personalities
- 10 playable stages, each with their own gimmicks that can be turned off for those looking for a more pure experience
- Extensive match customisation options with the ability to save favourite templates for future use
- Plenty to unlock by playing the multiplayer match maker or single player Galactic Cup and other modes
- Free post launch support

Currently I can only 100% confirm the game coming to PC like my previous title ERSATZ (https://store.steampowered.com/app/703720/ERSATZ/). However, I've designed the game from the ground up with the Nintendo Switch in mind. I cannot yet confirm it hurtling towards that lovely hybrid system I'm such a fan of, as I'm entirely self funded so far, and so have a few hurdles I need to clear in the coming year.

If you want to help me reach my goal of bringing ZONERS to console, then help spread the word!

Design, Art, Animation & Programming by me, Paris Stalker.
Twitter: @paris_stalker & @ALLiN_indie

SFX: Max Newton
Linkedin - www.linkedin.com/in/maxnewtonaudio

Featuring music from:
CRYSTALBOY 
Website - www.crystalboy.com
Twitter+Instagram - @crystalxboy

RoBKTA
Twitter - @RoB_KTA
Instagram - @robktastagram
Facebook - www.facebook.com/robktamusic
Soundcloud, Spotify, Bandcamp - RoBKTA

Shadow Mantra Steve
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3tw4ZlRfkTkQ_r51RqG9aA
Website - https://www.shadowmantra.com/
